title: Worked Solution
text: The conversion factor between kilometers and miles is approximately $$0.621$$. Therefore, $$100$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$ is equivalent to:\n$$100$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$ * $$0.621$$ $$=$$ $$62.1$$ $$\frac{miles}{hour}$$\nRounding to one decimal place, the speed limit in miles per hour is approximately $$62.1$$ mph.
